Package yaak.agent.communication.jmx

This package implements a JMX-based communications server.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChannelManagementNotifierMBean ChannelManagementNotifierMBean is an MBean for inter-application channel management.
 

Class Summary
ChannelManagementNotifier ChannelManagementNotifier is an MBean for inter-application channel management.
ChannelNotification ChannelNotification adds channel-related information to a notification.
CommunicationHandlerDistributedDynamicBean CommunicationHandlerDistributedDynamicBean is the (local) dynamic JMX MBean representing a communication channel in the local application.
CommunicationServerImpl CommunicationServerImpl handles point-to-point and publish/subscribe messaging.
 

Package yaak.agent.communication.jmx Description

This package implements a JMX-based communications server.
